title: Scientists Advising The UK Government On The Coronavirus Fear Boris Johnson’s Team Is Using Them As “Human Shields”
description: Ministers are answering criticism by insisting they were “guided by the science”. But government experts say in reality science is “riddled with doubt, uncertainty and debate”.View Entire Post ›
content: Some of the scientists advising the UK government on its handling of the coronavirus pandemic fear they will be used by ministers as human shields at a future public inquiry, and have privately discussed how to protect themselves from any attempted blame game… [+4526 chars]
